channel.title: Ultimate tug-o-war

item.title: Ultimate tug-o-war
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Bartdudecool:

Yo the link to download srl dont work no more how are we supoes to get it ??? i tried there main website but i still cant download it it sayz link not avialbe

Nice gravedig…

Note that this script doesn’t even use SRL, no reason to include it…

[code]program ultimatetugowar;

begin
repeat
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘v’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘x’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘n’));
Sleep(65);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘v’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘x’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘n’))
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘b’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘c’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘m’));
Sleep(65);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘b’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘m’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘c’));
If (FindColorTolerance(x, y, 3983594, 95, 10, 180, 45, 25))Then
begin
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘q’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘e’));
Sleep(45);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘q’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘e’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘q’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘e’));
Sleep(65);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘q’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘e’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘q’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘e’));
Sleep(65);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘q’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘e’));
end;
until(False);
end.[/code]

item.title: Ultimate tug-o-war
item.dc:creator: @jahuro jahuro
item.description:
@jahuro wrote:

This plays tug-o-war AND does the combos. Please post comments.

program ultimatetugowar;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
 
begin
SetupSRL;
 repeat
  KeyDown(GetKeyCode('v'));
  KeyDown(GetKeyCode('x'));
  KeyDown(GetKeyCode('n'));
  Sleep(65);
  KeyUp(GetKeyCode('v'));
  KeyUp(GetKeyCode('x'));
  KeyUp(GetKeyCode('n'))
  KeyDown(GetKeyCode('b'));
  KeyDown(GetKeyCode('c'));
  KeyDown(GetKeyCode('m'));
  Sleep(65);
  KeyUp(GetKeyCode('b'));
  KeyUp(GetKeyCode('m'));
  KeyUp(GetKeyCode('c'));
  If (FindColorTolerance(x, y, 3983594, 95, 10, 180, 45, 25))Then
   begin
    KeyDown(GetKeyCode('q'));
    KeyDown(GetKeyCode('w'));
    KeyDown(GetKeyCode('e'));
    Sleep(45);
    KeyUp(GetKeyCode('q'));
    KeyUp(GetKeyCode('w'));
    KeyUp(GetKeyCode('e'));
    KeyDown(GetKeyCode('q'));
    KeyDown(GetKeyCode('w'));
    KeyDown(GetKeyCode('e'));
    Sleep(65);
    KeyUp(GetKeyCode('q'));
    KeyUp(GetKeyCode('w'));
    KeyUp(GetKeyCode('e'));
    KeyDown(GetKeyCode('q'));
    KeyDown(GetKeyCode('w'));
    KeyDown(GetKeyCode('e'));
    Sleep(65);
    KeyUp(GetKeyCode('q'));
    KeyUp(GetKeyCode('w'));
    KeyUp(GetKeyCode('e'));
   end;
 until(False);
end.

Read full topic
